title: League Wont stop crashing
body:
Can anyone help. i just got a new pc and decided to reinstall league but after downloading the client it keeps insta-crashing and reopening before i can stop the program or log in. wtf do i do.
{{sticker:sg-janna}}

replies.body: I was getting the same problem and turning off the Discord overlay seems to have fixed it
That seems to be the problem, I turned off Discord overlay and my client is working now.
This fixed it! took me 2 hours did a fresh install and everything before i found this post {{sticker:sg-zephyr}}
Thanks. I closed Discord and the client stopped crashing.
Run league as "run as administrator" works fine with discord for me after doing so. You may also have to run discord as administrator after doing so.
Just wanted to confirm that we have been receiving a lot of crash reports, and it does seem to be caused by Discord Overlay.  Disable it for the time being to resolve the crash.
Yes. Close Discord and try. That ended the loop for me.
Tried running Discord on admin, client is still getting bugged.
i cant use discord push to talk if i run as administrator :(

I play hourly, daily; even today. Now my client goes into a launch loop + bug report + restart of client until I halt it with CtrlAltDelete.

Looking for any answers to bug too!
